GEAR

Government Enhanced Administrative Resource

08 January 2015

Welcome to Gear

GEAR is an acronym for Government Enhanced Administrative Resource. GearSystems realise the GEAR through various procedures. GearSystems aim for a better society and are highly democratic. A better house makes an example for making a better street. A better street...
